rawConfiguration.text:
# Roku Quality of Experience
---

* How many Roku devices are playing videos?
* Can users access the stream?
* What is the crash rate?
* Are there video start failures?
* How long does it take from content request to content start (time to first frame)?
* Are there rebuffering or interruptions?

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT uniqueCount(uuid) from ConnectedDeviceSystem since 30 minutes ago COMPARE WITH 1 week ago

FROM ConnectedDeviceSystem SELECT filter(count(*), WHERE actionName = 'APP_STARTED' and lastExitOrTerminationReason IN ('EXIT_BRIGHTSCRIPT_TIMEOUT', 'EXIT_BRIGHTSCRIPT_CRASH', 'EXIT_OUT_OF_MEMORY')) / filter(count(*), WHERE actionName = 'APP_STARTED') * 100 as '%'COMPARE WITH 1 week ago

FROM RokuVideo SELECT filter(count(*), WHERE actionName = 'CONTENT_ERROR' and contentPlayhead = 0) / filter(count(*), WHERE actionName = 'CONTENT_START' and contentPlayhead = 0)  * 100  as '%' since 30 minutes ago COMPARE WITH 1 week ago
FROM ConnectedDeviceSystem SELECT filter(count(*), WHERE  actionName = 'HTTP_ERROR') / filter(count(*), where actionName = 'HTTP_REQUEST') * 100 as '%'COMPARE WITH 1 week ago
FROM RokuVideo SELECT filter(count(*), WHERE actionName ='CONTENT_ERROR') / filter(count(*), WHERE actionName IN ('CONTENT_START', 'CONTENT_NEXT')) * 100 as '%'COMPARE WITH 1 week ago

FROM RokuVideo SELECT filter(count(*), WHERE actionName ='CONTENT_BUFFER_START' and contentPlayhead != 0) / filter(count(*), WHERE actionName IN ('CONTENT_START', 'CONTENT_NEXT')) as '%'COMPARE WITH 1 week ago
FROM RokuVideo SELECT percentile(timeSinceBufferBegin/1000, 50) as 'seconds' WHERE actionName ='CONTENT_BUFFER_END' and contentPlayhead != 0 COMPARE WITH 1 week ago
FROM RokuVideo SELECT percentile(timeSinceBufferBegin/1000, 50) as 'seconds' WHERE actionName ='CONTENT_BUFFER_END' and contentPlayhead = 0 COMPARE WITH 1 week ago
FROM RokuVideo SELECT percentile(timeSinceLoad, 50) as 'seconds' WHERE actionName ='PLAYER_READY' COMPARE WITH 1 week ago
FROM RokuVideo SELECT percentile(contentMeasuredBitrate, 50) COMPARE WITH 1 week ago
SELECT uniqueCount(uuid) from ConnectedDeviceSystem since 30 minutes ago TIMESERIES auto facet deviceModel

FROM ConnectedDeviceSystem SELECT (filter(count(*), WHERE actionName = 'APP_STARTED' and lastExitOrTerminationReason IN ('EXIT_BRIGHTSCRIPT_TIMEOUT', 'EXIT_BRIGHTSCRIPT_CRASH', 'EXIT_OUT_OF_MEMORY')) / filter(count(*), WHERE actionName = 'APP_STARTED')) as '%' facet deviceModel timeseries auto

FROM RokuVideo SELECT  filter(count(*), WHERE actionName = 'CONTENT_ERROR' and contentPlayhead = 0) / filter(count(*), WHERE actionName = 'CONTENT_START' and contentPlayhead = 0) * 100 as 'Video Start Failure' facet deviceModel timeseries AUTO

FROM ConnectedDeviceSystem SELECT filter(count(*), WHERE  actionName = 'HTTP_ERROR') / filter(count(*), where actionName = 'HTTP_REQUEST') * 100 as 'HTTP Error Ratio' facet deviceModel timeseries auto

FROM RokuVideo SELECT filter(count(*), WHERE actionName ='CONTENT_BUFFER_START' and contentPlayhead != 0) / filter(count(*), WHERE actionName IN ('CONTENT_START', 'CONTENT_NEXT')) as 'Interruption Ratio' facet deviceModel timeseries AUTO

FROM RokuVideo SELECT filter(count(*), WHERE actionName ='CONTENT_ERROR') / filter(count(*), WHERE actionName IN ('CONTENT_START', 'CONTENT_NEXT')) * 100 as 'Content Error Ratio' facet deviceModel TIMESERIES auto
FROM RokuVideo SELECT percentile(timeSinceBufferBegin/1000, 50) as 'seconds' WHERE actionName ='CONTENT_BUFFER_END' and contentPlayhead != 0 facet deviceModel TIMESERIES auto
FROM RokuVideo SELECT percentile(timeSinceBufferBegin/1000, 50) as 'seconds' WHERE actionName ='CONTENT_BUFFER_END' and contentPlayhead = 0 facet deviceModel TIMESERIES AUTO
FROM RokuVideo SELECT percentile(timeSinceLoad, 50) as 'seconds' WHERE actionName ='PLAYER_READY' facet deviceModel TIMESERIES AUTO
FROM RokuVideo SELECT percentile(contentMeasuredBitrate, 50) facet deviceModel TIMESERIES AUTO

FROM ConnectedDeviceSystem, RokuVideo SELECT filter(count(*), WHERE actionName ='APP_STARTED' and lastExitOrTerminationReason IN ( 'EXIT_BRIGHTSCRIPT_TIMEOUT', 'EXIT_BRIGHTSCRIPT_CRASH', 'EXIT_OUT_OF_MEMORY')) as 'Crashes', filter(count(*), WHERE actionName = 'CONTENT_ERROR' and contentPlayhead = 0) as 'Video Start Failures', filter(count(*), WHERE actionName = 'HTTP_ERROR') as 'HTTP Errors', filter(count(*), WHERE actionName = 'CONTENT_ERROR') as 'Content Errors', filter(count(*), WHERE actionName = 'CONTENT_BUFFER_START' and contentPlayhead > 0) as 'Interruptions', filter(percentile(timeSinceBufferBegin/1000, 50), WHERE actionName = 'CONTENT_BUFFER_END' and contentPlayhead > 0) as 'Rebuffer Time (s)',  filter(percentile(timeSinceBufferBegin/1000, 50), WHERE actionName = 'CONTENT_BUFFER_END' and contentPlayhead = 0) as 'Initial Buffer Time (s)', filter(percentile(timeSinceLoad, 50), WHERE actionName = 'PLAYER_READY') as 'Player Load Time (s)', filter(percentile(contentMeasuredBitrate, 50), WHERE actionName = 'CONTENT_HEARTBEAT') as 'Measured Bitrate'  since 30 minutes ago
FROM ConnectedDeviceSystem, RokuVideo SELECT uniqueCount(uuid) timeseries auto

FROM ConnectedDeviceSystem SELECT filter(count(*), WHERE actionName = 'APP_STARTED' and lastExitOrTerminationReason IN ('EXIT_BRIGHTSCRIPT_TIMEOUT', 'EXIT_BRIGHTSCRIPT_CRASH', 'EXIT_OUT_OF_MEMORY')) / filter(count(*), WHERE actionName = 'APP_STARTED') * 100 facet uuid

FROM RokuVideo SELECT filter(count(*), WHERE actionName = 'CONTENT_ERROR' and contentPlayhead = 0) / filter(count(*), WHERE actionName = 'CONTENT_START' and contentPlayhead = 0)  * 100  as '%' facet uuid
FROM ConnectedDeviceSystem SELECT filter(count(*), WHERE  actionName = 'HTTP_ERROR') / filter(count(*), where actionName = 'HTTP_REQUEST') * 100 as '%'facet uuid
FROM RokuVideo SELECT filter(count(*), WHERE actionName ='CONTENT_ERROR') / filter(count(*), WHERE actionName IN ('CONTENT_START', 'CONTENT_NEXT')) * 100 as '%'facet uuid
FROM RokuVideo SELECT filter(count(*), WHERE actionName ='CONTENT_BUFFER_START' and contentPlayhead != 0) / filter(count(*), WHERE actionName IN ('CONTENT_START', 'CONTENT_NEXT')) as '%'facet uuid
FROM RokuVideo SELECT percentile(timeSinceBufferBegin/1000, 50) as 'seconds' WHERE actionName ='CONTENT_BUFFER_END' and contentPlayhead != 0 facet uuid
FROM RokuVideo SELECT percentile(timeSinceBufferBegin/1000, 50) as 'seconds' WHERE actionName ='CONTENT_BUFFER_END' and contentPlayhead = 0 facet uuid
FROM RokuVideo SELECT percentile(timeSinceLoad, 50) as 'seconds' WHERE actionName ='PLAYER_READY' facet uuid
FROM RokuVideo SELECT percentile(contentMeasuredBitrate, 50) facet uuid
FROM ConnectedDeviceSystem, RokuVideo SELECT * limit 1000

FROM ConnectedDeviceSystem SELECT filter(count(*), WHERE actionName = 'APP_STARTED' and lastExitOrTerminationReason IN ('EXIT_BRIGHTSCRIPT_TIMEOUT', 'EXIT_BRIGHTSCRIPT_CRASH', 'EXIT_OUT_OF_MEMORY')) / filter(count(*), WHERE actionName = 'APP_STARTED') * 100 as '%'

FROM ConnectedDeviceSystem SELECT (filter(count(*), WHERE actionName = 'APP_STARTED' and lastExitOrTerminationReason IN ('EXIT_BRIGHTSCRIPT_TIMEOUT', 'EXIT_BRIGHTSCRIPT_CRASH', 'EXIT_OUT_OF_MEMORY')) / filter(count(*), WHERE actionName = 'APP_STARTED')) as '%' facet deviceModel timeseries auto

FROM ConnectedDeviceSystem SELECT count(*) as 'Crashes' WHERE actionName = 'APP_STARTED' and lastExitOrTerminationReason IN ('EXIT_BRIGHTSCRIPT_TIMEOUT', 'EXIT_BRIGHTSCRIPT_CRASH', 'EXIT_OUT_OF_MEMORY') FACET deviceModel

FROM ConnectedDeviceSystem SELECT count(*) as 'Crashes' WHERE actionName = 'APP_STARTED' and lastExitOrTerminationReason IN ('EXIT_BRIGHTSCRIPT_TIMEOUT', 'EXIT_BRIGHTSCRIPT_CRASH', 'EXIT_OUT_OF_MEMORY') FACET lastExitOrTerminationReason

FROM ConnectedDeviceSystem SELECT count(*) as 'Crashes' WHERE actionName = 'APP_STARTED' and lastExitOrTerminationReason IN ('EXIT_BRIGHTSCRIPT_TIMEOUT', 'EXIT_BRIGHTSCRIPT_CRASH', 'EXIT_OUT_OF_MEMORY') FACET appVersion, appBuild

FROM ConnectedDeviceSystem SELECT count(*) as 'Crashes' WHERE actionName = 'APP_STARTED' and lastExitOrTerminationReason IN ('EXIT_BRIGHTSCRIPT_TIMEOUT', 'EXIT_BRIGHTSCRIPT_CRASH', 'EXIT_OUT_OF_MEMORY') FACET appVersion, appBuild TIMESERIES auto

FROM RokuVideo SELECT filter(count(*), WHERE actionName = 'CONTENT_ERROR' and contentPlayhead = 0) / filter(count(*), WHERE actionName = 'CONTENT_START' and contentPlayhead = 0)  * 100  as '%' since 30 minutes ago

FROM RokuVideo SELECT  filter(count(*), WHERE actionName = 'CONTENT_ERROR' and contentPlayhead = 0) / filter(count(*), WHERE actionName = 'CONTENT_START' and contentPlayhead = 0) * 100 as 'Video Start Failure' facet deviceModel timeseries AUTO
FROM RokuVideo SELECT count(*) WHERE actionName = 'CONTENT_ERROR' and contentPlayhead = 0 facet errorMessage since 30 minutes ago
FROM RokuVideo SELECT count(*) WHERE actionName = 'CONTENT_ERROR' and contentPlayhead = 0 facet appVersion, appBuild since 30 minutes ago
FROM RokuVideo SELECT count(*) WHERE actionName = 'CONTENT_ERROR' and contentPlayhead = 0 facet appVersion, appBuild since 30 minutes ago TIMESERIES auto
FROM RokuVideo SELECT filter(count(*), WHERE actionName = 'CONTENT_ERROR' and contentPlayhead > 0) / filter(count(*), WHERE actionName = 'CONTENT_START')  * 100  as '%' since 30 minutes ago

FROM RokuVideo SELECT  filter(count(*), WHERE actionName = 'CONTENT_ERROR' and contentPlayhead > 0) / filter(count(*), WHERE actionName = 'CONTENT_START') * 100 as 'Video Start Failure' facet deviceModel timeseries AUTO
FROM RokuVideo SELECT count(*) WHERE actionName = 'CONTENT_ERROR' and contentPlayhead > 0 facet errorMessage since 30 minutes ago

widgets.title: In-stream Errors by App Version, Build

nrqlQueries.query: FROM RokuVideo SELECT count(*) WHERE actionName = 'CONTENT_ERROR' and contentPlayhead > 0 facet appVersion, appBuild since 30 minutes ago

widgets.title: In-stream Errors by App Version, Build

nrqlQueries.query: FROM RokuVideo SELECT count(*) WHERE actionName = 'CONTENT_ERROR' and contentPlayhead > 0 facet appVersion, appBuild since 30 minutes ago TIMESERIES auto
FROM ConnectedDeviceSystem SELECT filter(count(*), WHERE  actionName = 'HTTP_ERROR') / filter(count(*), where actionName = 'HTTP_REQUEST') * 100 as '%'
FROM ConnectedDeviceSystem SELECT count(*) where actionName like 'HTTP%' facet actionName
FROM ConnectedDeviceSystem SELECT count(*) where actionName like 'HTTP%' facet origUrl

FROM ConnectedDeviceSystem SELECT filter(count(*), WHERE  actionName = 'HTTP_ERROR') / filter(count(*), where actionName = 'HTTP_REQUEST') * 100 as 'HTTP Error Ratio' facet deviceModel timeseries auto
FROM ConnectedDeviceSystem SELECT count(*) where actionName like 'HTTP%' and httpResult != 'OK' facet httpResult
SELECT count(*) FROM ConnectedDeviceSystem WHERE actionName='HTTP_ERROR' AND origUrl LIKE '%.ts%' FACET status SINCE 1 week ago TIMESERIES

SELECT count(*) FROM ConnectedDeviceSystem WHERE actionName='HTTP_ERROR' AND (origUrl NOT LIKE '%.mp4%' AND origUrl NOT LIKE '%.m3u8%' AND origUrl NOT LIKE '%.ts%' AND origUrl NOT LIKE '%.mpd%') FACET status SINCE 1 month ago TIMESERIES

SELECT count(*) FROM ConnectedDeviceSystem WHERE actionName='HTTP_ERROR' AND (origUrl LIKE '%.mp4%' AND origUrl NOT LIKE '%index_audio%.mp4%' AND origUrl NOT LIKE '%index_video%.mp4%') FACET status SINCE 1 week ago TIMESERIES
SELECT count(*) FROM ConnectedDeviceSystem WHERE actionName='HTTP_ERROR' AND (origUrl LIKE '%.m3u8%') FACET status SINCE 1 month ago TIMESERIES

widgets.title: HTTP First Byte and Transfer Time

nrqlQueries.query: FROM ConnectedDeviceSystem SELECT percentile(firstByteTime, 50), percentile(transferTime, 50) timeseries auto

FROM RokuVideo SELECT filter(count(*), WHERE actionName ='CONTENT_BUFFER_START' and contentPlayhead != 0) / filter(count(*), WHERE actionName IN ('CONTENT_START', 'CONTENT_NEXT')) as '%'COMPARE WITH 1 week ago

FROM RokuVideo SELECT filter(count(*), WHERE actionName ='CONTENT_BUFFER_START' and contentPlayhead != 0) / filter(count(*), WHERE actionName IN ('CONTENT_START', 'CONTENT_NEXT')) as 'Interruption Ratio' facet deviceModel timeseries AUTO
FROM RokuVideo SELECT count(*) as 'Buffer Starts' WHERE actionName ='CONTENT_BUFFER_START' and contentPlayhead != 0 facet connectionType   since 30 seconds ago
FROM RokuVideo SELECT percentile(timeSinceBufferBegin/1000, 50) as 'seconds' WHERE actionName ='CONTENT_BUFFER_END' and contentPlayhead != 0 COMPARE WITH 1 week ago
FROM RokuVideo SELECT percentile(timeSinceBufferBegin/1000, 50) as 'seconds' WHERE actionName ='CONTENT_BUFFER_END' and contentPlayhead != 0 facet deviceModel TIMESERIES auto
FROM RokuVideo SELECT percentile(timeSinceBufferBegin/1000, 50) as 'seconds' WHERE actionName ='CONTENT_BUFFER_END' and contentPlayhead != 0 facet connectionType
FROM RokuVideo SELECT percentile(timeSinceBufferBegin/1000, 50) as 'seconds' WHERE actionName ='CONTENT_BUFFER_END' and contentPlayhead = 0 COMPARE WITH 1 week ago
FROM RokuVideo SELECT percentile(timeSinceBufferBegin/1000, 50) as 'seconds' WHERE actionName ='CONTENT_BUFFER_END' and contentPlayhead = 0 facet deviceModel TIMESERIES AUTO
FROM RokuVideo SELECT percentile(timeSinceBufferBegin/1000, 50) as 'seconds' WHERE actionName ='CONTENT_BUFFER_END' and contentPlayhead > 0 facet connectionType

widgets.title: Views with the Most Rebuffer Events

nrqlQueries.query: FROM RokuVideo SELECT count(*) Where actionName ='CONTENT_BUFFER_START' and contentPlayhead > 0 FACET viewId
FROM RokuVideo SELECT sum(timeSinceBufferBegin/1000) WHERE actionName = 'CONTENT_BUFFER_END' and contentPlayhead > 0 FACET viewId

widgets.title: Views with the Most Initial Buffer Events

nrqlQueries.query: FROM RokuVideo SELECT count(*) Where actionName ='CONTENT_BUFFER_START' and contentPlayhead = 0 FACET viewId

widgets.title: Views with Longest Initial Buffer Times

nrqlQueries.query: FROM RokuVideo SELECT sum(timeSinceBufferBegin/1000) WHERE actionName = 'CONTENT_BUFFER_END' and contentPlayhead = 0 FACET viewId
FROM RokuVideo SELECT *
FROM RokuVideo SELECT percentile(timeSinceLoad, 50) as 'seconds' WHERE actionName ='PLAYER_READY' COMPARE WITH 1 week ago
FROM RokuVideo SELECT percentile(timeSinceLoad, 50) as 'seconds' WHERE actionName ='PLAYER_READY' facet deviceModel TIMESERIES AUTO
FROM RokuVideo SELECT percentile(timeSinceLoad, 50) as 'seconds' WHERE actionName ='PLAYER_READY' facet deviceModel
FROM RokuVideo SELECT histogram(timeSinceLoad, buckets: 10, width: 20) WHERE actionName ='PLAYER_READY' facet deviceModel
